name: clean-arc
description: A simple clean architecture framework, letting possible to code in the simplest way and letting all the code explicit

scripts.publish:common: npm run build && cd ./dist/common && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:core: npm run build && cd ./dist/core && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:rabbitmq: npm run build && cd ./dist/microservices/rabbitmq && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:express: npm run build && cd ./dist/http/express && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:common && npm run publish:core && npm run publish:rabbitmq && npm run publish:express
